data.utilizationMethod: Kneel beside the sofa and glide the pen across the smooth leather seat cushion in sweeping arcs.
Hold the cylindrical battery near its positive terminal with a pen-like grip and move hand to draw
Curl fingers around the flattened body while thumb rests opposite, then squeeze the pliable tube repeatedly toward the nozzle end.

data.proxyObjectName: blue and white tissue box with one tissue pulled out
data.utilizationMethod: Flatten the exposed tissue back against the box and use the smooth top panel of the box as the writing surface.
Hold the stem near its midpoint with a light pinch grip and guide the bowl’s base rim across the table in smooth strokes
Grip the foam handle, extend the pole slightly, and sweep the phone clamp end in broad arcs as if rolling paint
